survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Smart Kitchen Appliances Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and usage patterns for smart kitchen appliances to inform product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Consider adding an 'Other (please specify)' option to capture any appliances not listed. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with clear checkboxes.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with checkboxes. Include an 'Other' field with an open-text option if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart kitchen appliances do you currently own? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not own any smart kitchen appliances)
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Add a 'Not applicable' option for respondents who do not own any smart kitchen appliances.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with radio buttons. Include a 'Not applicable' option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your smart kitchen appliances?
answer_options: Not applicable (I do not own any smart kitchen appliances)
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in a smart kitchen appliance? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Voice control integration (e.g., Alexa, Google Assistant)
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize responses. Ensure the question is easy to navigate on mobile devices.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question with a maximum of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' field with an open-text option if selected.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in a smart kitchen appliance? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Voice control integration (e.g., Alexa, Google Assistant)
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 does not include 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you have not purchased a smart kitchen appliance?
answer_options: Not familiar with smart kitchen appliances
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 includes 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture additional reasons. Keep the question concise for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question with radio buttons. Include an 'Other' field with an open-text option if selected.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you have not purchased a smart kitchen appliance?
answer_options: Not familiar with smart kitchen appliances
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 includes 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase a smart kitchen appliance in the next 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure purchase intent. Ensure the question is straightforward and mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase a smart kitchen appliance in the next 12 months?

questions.question_text: What additional features or improvements would encourage you to purchase or use smart kitchen appliances more often?
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question with a large input field.
